Over $9B Locked. Modular Infra with $DOT  and VANA    $MNT  brought modular efficiency to Ethereum with separate execution and data layers. Polkadot modularized blockchains with parachains, enabling connected ecosystems    Vana extends modularity to data itself, making it verified, user-owned, and rewarded.  Networks have mastered how data moves. Vana defines who owns it.    As modular ecosystems expand, Vana becomes the missing layer, turning information into an asset class governed by its creators.    The next wave of modular systems are composable and user-owned.    #Altcoin Season#  #Macro Insights#
